message.name: ERR_RV_MUST_ENTER_PAGE_ID
message.locale: You must specify UIM Page ID.

message.name: ERR_RV_DUPLICATE_RECORD_USER_HOME_PAGE
message.locale: A User Homepage configuration already exists for the page '%1s' and security role '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RV_DUPLICATE_RECORD_USER_HOME_PAGE_NO_SECURITY
message.locale: A User Homepage configuration already exists for the page '%1s' with no security role.

message.name: ERR_RV_DUPLICATE_RECORD_CUSTOMIZABLE_PAGE
message.locale: A configuration already exists for the page '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_GEN_PROCESS_FAILED
message.locale: An error occurred during the setup process. Please contact you administrator.

message.name: ERR_NUM_COLUMNS_FORMAT_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The number of columns must be specified using a number value.

message.name: ERR_NUM_COLUMNS_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The number of columns must greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_COLUMN_WIDTH_NUMBER_FORMAT_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The column widths must be specified using a number value between 1 and 100.

message.name: ERR_COLUMN_WIDTH_TOTAL_SIZE_NOT_100
message.locale: The total of all column widths must be 100.

message.name: ERR_NO_PODS_SELECTED
message.locale: You must select a minimum of 1 Pod to make available to the page.
